content.value: ReelMagic是一款AI视频处理软件，适合内容创作者、视频爱好者和专业编辑使用。它提供直观的界面和辅助工具，支持中英文，帮助您轻松编辑视频。
ReelMagic提供多种AI辅助编辑功能，覆盖从基础剪辑到高级处理。

items.title: 自动生成字幕
items.text: 一键分离音频，生成多语言字幕。

items.title: 音色语音克隆
items.text: 智能分离背景音，替换人物声音。

items.title: 卡通滤镜
items.text: 多种卡通风格滤镜，视频变为卡通动画。

items.title: 幻妆面具
items.text: 支持局部替换人脸，实现美颜和画质增强。

items.title: 基础剪辑
items.text: 基础视频剪辑功能，包括拼接、裁剪、转场等。

items.title: 视频混剪
items.text: 将多个视频、音频、特效组合，创建新内容。

content.value: 卡通滤镜功能
ReelMagic的AI功能可以优化视频质量，包括色彩校正、降噪等，让视频快速改善。
幻妆面具功能
ReelMagic幻妆面具功能，包括人脸替换、局部替换、细节增强，让视频快速提升。
语音克隆功能
选择目标视频与一段模仿者的音色，模仿者会根据视频声音进行模仿。
了解ReelMagic的基础剪辑功能，快速开始视频编辑。

items.title: 选取剪辑内容
items.description: 拖动时间线选取视频段落，鼠标滚轮缩放时间线。

items.title: 设置滤镜
items.description: 添加Cartoon或Face滤镜。可同时设置多个或组合。

items.title: 幻妆设置
items.description: 对于Face滤镜，左侧是替换的人像，右侧截取视频中的人像（默认使用第一张出现的人像）。

items.title: 生成视频
items.description: 点击生成视频按钮，设置滤镜配置属性。

items.title: 合成结束
items.description: 视频生成后自动预览，点击保存按钮另存视频。

items.title: 添加背景音乐和音效
items.description: 右键播放器窗口，选择叠加背景声音进行合成。

content.value: ReelMagic集成AI技术，支持生成字幕和多语言翻译。

items.title: 点击生成字幕
items.description: 打开视频后，点击生成字幕，软件根据语音生成字幕，可选择翻译成其他语言。

items.title: 烧录字幕
items.description: 右键生成的字幕，添加硬字幕或软字幕到视频。

items.title: 语音生成
items.description: 点击克隆音频，软件提取视频声音。

items.title: 声音克隆
items.description: 声音处理后，弹出角色列表，为每个角色选择配音音色，确认后生成配音。

items.title: 音频处理
items.description: 也可选择MP3音频文件进行声音克隆。

items.title: 右键菜单
items.description: 通过右键菜单快速截取音色或视频文件，点击预览窗格显示视频关键帧。

content.value: ReelMagic is an AI video editing tool designed for content creators, video enthusiasts, and professional editors. It features a user-friendly interface and practical tools with bilingual support, making video editing straightforward.
ReelMagic offers various AI-assisted editing features, covering from basic editing to advanced processing.

items.title: Auto Subtitle Generation
items.text: One-click audio separation and multi-language subtitle generation.

items.title: Voice Cloning
items.text: Intelligently separate background noise and replace character voices.

items.title: Cartoon Filters
items.text: Multiple cartoon style filters to turn videos into animations.

items.title: Face Mask
items.text: Support local face replacement for beautification and quality enhancement.

items.title: Basic Editing
items.text: Basic video editing functions including splicing, cropping, transitions, etc.

items.title: Video Mix
items.text: Combine multiple videos, audio, and effects to create new content.

content.value: Cartoon Filter Feature
ReelMagic's AI features can optimize video quality, including color correction, noise reduction, etc., to quickly improve videos.
Face Mask Feature
ReelMagic face mask feature includes face replacement, local replacement, and detail enhancement to quickly enhance videos.
Voice Cloning Feature
Select the target video and an imitator's voice tone, the imitator will mimic based on the video sound.
Learn ReelMagic's basic editing functions to quickly start video editing.

items.title: Select Editing Content
items.description: Drag on the timeline to select video segments, use mouse wheel to zoom timeline.

items.title: Set Filters
items.description: Add Cartoon or Face filters. Multiple filters can be set or combined.

items.title: Face Mask Settings
items.description: For Face filter, left side is the replacement face, right side captures face from video (default uses the first appearing face).

items.title: Generate Video
items.description: Click generate video button, set filter configuration properties.

items.title: Synthesis Complete
items.description: Video is automatically previewed after generation, click save button to export video.

items.title: Add Background Music and Sound Effects
items.description: Right-click player window to overlay background sound for synthesis.

content.value: ReelMagic integrates AI technology to support subtitle generation and multi-language translation.

items.title: Click Generate Subtitle
items.description: After opening video, click generate subtitle, software generates subtitles from speech, can translate to other languages.

items.title: Burn Subtitle
items.description: Right-click generated subtitle to add hard or soft subtitles to video.

items.title: Voice Generation
items.description: Click clone audio, software extracts video sound.

items.title: Voice Cloning
items.description: After sound processing, character list pops up, select voice tone for each character, confirm to generate dubbing.

items.title: Audio Processing
items.description: Also can select MP3 audio files for voice cloning.

items.title: Right-click Menu
items.description: Use right-click menu to quickly capture voice or video files, click preview pane to show video keyframes.
